content.question: Which of the following statements best illustrates a social-cognitive explanation for the development of depression?

choices.label: Carson has a genetic predisposition toward depression, so he is more likely to develop depression.
Yolanda ruminates about her failures, so she is more likely to develop depression.
Xander's ancestors were more likely to survive when they displayed symptoms of depression, so he is more likely to develop depression.
Beatrice has not reached self-actualization, so she is more likely to develop depression.

content.answer: Yolanda ruminates about her failures, so she is more likely to develop depression.

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
